text: Kitabe tomadera prati tini to nayila karechena ye, yakhana tomara sunabe, allahara ayata pratyakhyata hacche ebam ta niye bidrupa kara hacche, takhana ye paryanta tara an'ya prasange lipta na habe tomara tadera sathe baso na [1], nayato tomara'o tadera mata habe [2]. Munaphika ebam kaphera saba'ike allaha to jahanname ekatra karabena
